trans-unit.source: Marks the attributed class as an event class.
trans-unit.target: 將屬性化類別標記為事件類別。

trans-unit.source: If `EventClass` is specified, it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog; if enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component.
trans-unit.target: 如果`EventClass`是指定絕對不能停止 COM + 目錄中; 如果啟用 COM + 目錄中，您必須指定元件上。

trans-unit.source: Method calls on an event class are never delivered to the implementation; they are instead delivered to event subscribers.
trans-unit.target: 方法會呼叫在事件類別會永遠不會傳遞到實作;它們會改為傳遞至事件訂閱者。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute>, see the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute>，請參閱<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: There is no unconfigured default value for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 沒有這個屬性未設定的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for a configured instance of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示設定的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether subscribers can be activated in the publisher's process.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出訂閱者是否可以在發行者的處理序中啟動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if subscribers can be activated in the publisher's process; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果訂閱者可以在發行者的處理序中啟動，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether events are to be delivered to subscribers in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出事件是否要平行送至訂閱者。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if events are to be delivered to subscribers in parallel; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件要平行送至訂閱者，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a publisher filter for an event method.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定事件方法的發行者篩選條件。
